text.div:
Mechanical Complications of hip and knee prosthetic devices

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm
    Code Display

    T84.010D Broken internal right hip prosthesis, subsequent encounter
    T84.010S Broken internal right hip prosthesis, sequela
